channel.title: John Wayne on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in John Wayne on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Edward Faulkner, Actor in John Wayne and Elvis Presley Films, Dies at 93
item.description: The Kentucky native worked often with director Andrew V. McLaglen and did lots of Westerns on screens big and small.

item.title: Edward Faulkner, Actor in John Wayne and Elvis Presley Films, Dies at 93
item.description: The Kentucky native worked often with director Andrew V. McLaglen and did lots of Westerns on screens big and small.

item.title: David Ketchum, the Cooped-Up Agent 13 on ‘Get Smart,’ Dies at 97
item.description: He also starred on ‘I’m Dickens, He’s Fenster’ and ‘Camp Runamuck’ and wrote for nearly four dozen shows, from ‘Hey, Landlord’ and ‘MAS*H’ to ‘MacGyver’ and ‘Full House.’

item.title: David Ketchum, the Cooped-Up Agent 13 on ‘Get Smart,’ Dies at 97
item.description: He also starred on ‘I’m Dickens, He’s Fenster’ and ‘Camp Runamuck’ and wrote for nearly four dozen shows, from ‘Hey, Landlord’ and ‘MAS*H’ to ‘MacGyver’ and ‘Full House.’
